MaCh3PythonUtils.diagnostics.mcmc_plots.posteriors.posterior_base_classes module

HI : Contains a set of base classes with methods common to posterior plotting code Separated into 1D and 2D-like objects to make life easier

MaCh3PythonUtils.diagnostics.mcmc_plots.posteriors.posteriors_2d module

HI : Makes 2D posterior plots. Currently no way of putting a legend on the plot (thanks arviz…)
